posts.post_text: June 1, 2015 at 4:22 PM#2Create a preset with the correct value, label it something like lamp offThan make a macro that looks like this- Group X at preset "lamp off"- Off Group XX is the number of the group you want to switch off: keep a bit of time between the 2 lines to make sure the lamp off will be executed by the fixturesOr make a macro with values:- Group X; attribute lampcontrol at Y- Off Group XWhere Y is the value for lamp off. The name of the attribute might be slightly different because some manufacturers are putting the lamp control functions on other channels
